title: 'Save Us, Save Us': A Poem For The Migrants Lost At Sea
teaser: We asked poet Craig Morgan Teicher to find a poem to illuminate a recent news event. He says the capsized boat in the Mediterranean Sea made him think of Derek Mahon's "A Disused Shed in Co. Wexford."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
